bio: Environmental scientists, blockchain and space enthusiast | Founder: EcoSynthesisX , ReFi Phangan & GreenPill Phangan| Founding Steward @DeSpaceQF |
contributionDescription:
* Promoting Optimism and onboarding new users through X posts and spaces.
* As an Optimism enthusiast, I look for opportunities at in-person events to spread awareness of its capabilities and opportunities.
* I educate both individuals and communities on how Optimism can help address issues of high gas fees and network congestion. And how Optimism support public goods funding and make world better.
* In my efforts to further adoption, I recently applied to become a Local Optimist representative in my area to organize meetups and workshops

contributionLinks.description: X post mentioning me and banner
X post invite to donate via Optimism
X post mentions Optimism public good funding efforts
X post mentioning start of Optimism QF on Giveth

impactDescription:
* Promoting & onboarding via X posts: Increased awareness, education, and participation in Optimism .
* Promoting via X shill spaces: Enhanced reputation and influence of Optimism and its ecosystem.
* Promoting & onboarding individuals and community during irl events: Improved social capital and cohesion of Optimism and its ecosystem.
* Applied to be Local Optimist: Contributed to leadership and innovation of Optimism and its ecosystem.

impactMetrics.description: Amount of donors for Phangan projects

fundingSources.description: No grants or funding for the described contributions
